Package oop.cw.ticketing.controller

Class TicketWebController

java.lang.Object
oop.cw.ticketing.controller.TicketWebController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200") @RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class TicketWebController extends Object
The TicketWebController class provides REST API endpoints for managing the ticketing system. It includes operations for retrieving ticket pool information, adding customers and vendors, starting and stopping the system

  • Constructor Details

    • TicketWebController

      public TicketWebController(TicketManagerService ticketManagerService)
      Constructs a TicketWebController with the provided TicketManagerService.
      Parameters:
      ticketManagerService - The service responsible for managing ticketing system threads.

  • Method Details

    • ticketPoolInfo

      @GetMapping("/info") public int[] ticketPoolInfo()
      Returns ticket pool information such as maximum capacity, ticket release rate, and customer retrieval rate.
      Returns:
      An array of integers containing ticket pool details: [max capacity, ticket release rate, customer retrieval rate].

    • ticketPoolName

      @GetMapping("/name") public String ticketPoolName()
      Returns ticket pool name or the event name
      Returns:
      a string value of the event/ticketpool name

    • addCustomer

      @PostMapping("/addcustomer") public String addCustomer(@RequestParam String customerName, @RequestParam int tickets)
      Adds a customer to the ticketing system configuration.
      Parameters:
      customerName - The name of the customer to add.
      tickets - The number of tickets customer wishes to buy.
      Returns:
      A success message indicating the customer has been added.

    • addVendor

      @PostMapping("/addvendor") public String addVendor(@RequestParam String vendorName, @RequestParam int tickets)
      Adds a vendor to the ticketing system configuration
      Parameters:
      vendorName - The name of the vendor to add.
      tickets - The number of tickets vendor wishes to add.
      Returns:
      A success message indicating the vendor has been added.

    • startSystem

      @PostMapping("/start") public String startSystem() throws ThreadManagementException
      Starts the ticketing system by initializing threads for customers and vendors.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the ticketing system has been started successfully.
      Throws:
      ThreadManagementException - If an error occurs while managing threads.

    • stopSystem

      @PostMapping("/stop") public String stopSystem()
      Stops the ticketing system and terminates customer and vendor threads.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the threads have been stopped successfully.

    • isNull

      public Configuration isNull(String file)
      Checks if the configuration file exists and contains valid data.
      Parameters:
      file - The path to the configuration file.
      Returns:
      The Configuration object if the file exists and is valid, otherwise null.
